mapper.sql: ID, SYSTEM_ID, SPRINT_NAME, SPRINT_START_DATE, SPRINT_END_DATE, valid_STATUS, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sprint.ID id,sprint.SPRINT_NAME sprintName,sprint.SPRINT_START_DATE sprintStartDate,sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE sprintEndDate FROM tbl_sprint_info sprint WHERE sprint.STATUS = 1 AND sprint.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} and sprint.valid_STATUS = 1

SELECT DISTINCT sprint.ID id,sprint.SPRINT_NAME sprintName,sprint.SPRINT_START_DATE sprintStartDate,sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE sprintEndDate FROM tbl_sprint_info sprint WHERE sprint.STATUS = 1 AND sprint.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND sprint.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId} AND sprint.valid_STATUS = 1

SELECT DISTINCT sprint.ID id,sprint.SPRINT_NAME sprintName,sprint.SPRINT_START_DATE sprintStartDate,sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE sprintEndDate FROM tbl_sprint_info sprint WHERE sprint.STATUS = 1 AND sprint.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} and sprint.valid_STATUS = 1 and sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE < curdate() ORDER BY sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT DISTINCT sprint.ID id,sprint.SPRINT_NAME sprintName,sprint.SPRINT_START_DATE sprintStartDate,sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE sprintEndDate FROM tbl_sprint_info sprint WHERE sprint.STATUS = 1 AND sprint.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} and sprint.valid_STATUS = 1 and sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE >=curdate() ORDER BY sprint.SPRINT_END_DATE

select sprintInfo.ID id, sprintInfo.SPRINT_NAME sprintName, sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID systemId,sprintInfo.ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD estimteWorkload,sprintInfo.DEV_ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD devEstimteWorkload, sprintInfo.TEST_ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD testEstimteWorkload, sprintInfo.SPRINT_START_DATE sprintStartDate, sprintInfo.SPRINT_END_DATE sprintEndDate, system.SYSTEM_NAME systemName,tpp.ID projectPlanId,tpp.PLAN_NAME projectPlanName from tbl_sprint_info sprintInfo LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info system ON system.ID = sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_project_plan tpp ON tpp.ID = sprintInfo.PROJECT_PLAN_ID AND tpp.STATUS =1 where sprintInfo.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND system.STATUS =1

SELECT DISTINCT GROUP_CONCAT(sprintInfo.ID) sprintIdList, sprintInfo.SPRINT_NAME AS sprintName, sprintInfo.PROJECT_ID AS projectIds, GROUP_CONCAT(sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID) AS systemId, GROUP_CONCAT(si.SYSTEM_NAME) systemName, sprintInfo.SPRINT_START_DATE sprintStartDate, sprintInfo.SPRINT_END_DATE sprintEndDate, sprintInfo.CREATE_DATE createDate, sprintInfo.valid_STATUS AS validStatus, sprintInfo.PROJECT_PLAN_ID AS projectPlanId, tpp.PLAN_NAME AS projectPlanName, tpi.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName FROM tbl_sprint_info sprintInfo LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info si ON si.ID = sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID AND si.STATUS =1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_plan tpp ON tpp.ID = sprintInfo.PROJECT_PLAN_ID AND tpp.STATUS =1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info tpi ON tpi.ID = sprintInfo.PROJECT_ID AND tpi.STATUS =1
sprintInfo.ID IN
#{item}
AND sprintInfo.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY sprintInfo.SPRINT_NAME,sprintInfo.PROJECT_ID,sprintInfo.SPRINT_START_DATE,sprintInfo.SPRINT_END_DATE,sprintInfo.CREATE_DATE,sprintInfo.valid_STATUS,sprintInfo.PROJECT_PLAN_ID ORDER BY sprintInfo.CREATE_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sprint_info (ID, SYSTEM_ID, SPRINT_NAME, SPRINT_START_DATE, SPRINT_END_DATE, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sprintStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sprintEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tbl_sprint_info
ID,
SYSTEM_ID,
SPRINT_NAME,
SPRINT_START_DATE,
SPRINT_END_DATE,
STATUS,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DATE,
LAST_UPDATE_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,

#{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbl_sprint_info
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectIds,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SPRINT_NAME = #{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_PLAN_ID = #{projectPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SPRINT_START_DATE = #{sprintStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SPRINT_END_DATE = #{sprintEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
valid_STATUS = #{validStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD = #{estimteWorkload,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DEV_ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD = #{devEstimteWorkload,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TEST_ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD = #{testEstimteWorkload,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_sprint_info set SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SPRINT_NAME = #{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPRINT_START_DATE = #{sprintStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SPRINT_END_DATE = #{sprintEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from(SELECT DISTINCT sprintInfo.SPRINT_NAME AS sprintName, sprintInfo.PROJECT_ID AS projectIds, GROUP_CONCAT(sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID) AS systemIdList, GROUP_CONCAT(si.SYSTEM_NAME) AS systemName, sprintInfo.SPRINT_START_DATE AS sprintStartDate, sprintInfo.SPRINT_END_DATE AS sprintEndDate, sprintInfo.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, sprintInfo.valid_STATUS AS validStatus FROM tbl_sprint_info sprintInfo LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info si ON si.ID = sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID AND si.STATUS =1
and sprintInfo.SPRINT_NAME like concat("%",#{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and sprintInfo.SYSTEM_ID in
#{item}
and si.SYSTEM_NAME like concat("%",#{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and sprintInfo.valid_STATUS = #{validStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and sprintInfo.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY sprintInfo.SPRINT_NAME,sprintInfo.PROJECT_ID,sprintInfo.SPRINT_START_DATE,sprintInfo.SPRINT_END_DATE,sprintInfo.CREATE_DATE,sprintInfo.valid_STATUS ) count
mapper.update: update tbl_sprint_info set STATUS = 2, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sprint_info (SYSTEM_ID, SPRINT_NAME, PROJECT_PLAN_ID, SPRINT_START_DATE, SPRINT_END_DATE, valid_STATUS, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE,PROJECT_ID) values (#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sprintStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sprintEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectIds,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update tbl_sprint_info set valid_STATUS = 2, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tbl_sprint_info set valid_STATUS = 1, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tsi.ID id,tsi.SPRINT_NAME sprintName FROM tbl_sprint_info tsi WHERE tsi.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND tsi.STATUS = 1 AND tsi.valid_STATUS = 1 AND curdate() <= tsi.SPRINT_END_DATE AND curdate() >= tsi.SPRINT_START_DATE
